column4: BRIEF-Quebec regulator could issue new cease trade order against Valeant
column5: March 31 Quebec's securities regulator  the Authorite des marches financiers  said Thursday it would issue a new cease trade order against Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc officers  if the company's filings aren't completed by April 15.   (Reporting By Allison Lampert)

column4: FCC advances privacy proposal for U.S. internet users
column5: WASHINGTON  March 31 The U.S. Federal Communications Commission on Thursday advanced a proposal to ensure the privacy of broadband Internet users by barring providers from collecting user data without consent.

column4: SunEdison served DoJ subpoena on Vivint Solar deal
column5: Struggling solar company SunEdison Inc  said it received a subpoena from the U.S. Department of Justice seeking details related to its failed deal to buy Vivint Solar Inc and transactions with its two publicly listed units.
